titles.title: AMT Rate Reduction Act of 2009
AMT Rate Reduction Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the rate of the tentative minimum tax for noncorporate taxpayers to 24 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: AMT Rate Reduction Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce to 24% the rate of the tentative alternative minimum tax for noncorporate taxpayers.
